dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your mystic activities today.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.description: Manage your client appointments and schedule new readings.

schedule.title: Schedule a New Reading
schedule.step1_desc: Select the client for this reading.
schedule.step2_desc: Choose one or more services for this session.
schedule.step3_desc: Pick a date and time for the appointment.
schedule.summary_desc: Please review the appointment details before confirming.
schedule.success_toast_desc: Appointment for {{name}} on {{date}} has been successfully booked.

customers.title: Clients
customers.description: View and manage your client roster.

add.title: Add New Client
add.description: Enter the details for the new client.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been successfully added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: Explore the range of tarot reading services offered to guide you on your journey.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: An overview of the standard tarot service price list in Indonesia.
pricing.table_description: Prices may vary. Last updated: July 2025.

factors.experience: Experience: More well-known or experienced readers may have higher rates.
factors.media: Consultation Media: Offline (face-to-face) readings are usually more expensive.
factors.complexity: Number of Questions/Spreads: The more complex, the higher the price.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.description: Manage your public-facing tarot reader profile.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure your application preferences and settings.

specializations.title: Manage Specializations
specializations.description: Add, edit, or remove the tarot reading services you offer.

durations.title: Manage Durations & Pricing
durations.description: Set the available durations for your services and their corresponding prices.

payment.title: Payment Gateways
payment.description: Connect and manage your payment methods.

reading.title: AI-Powered Tarot Reading
reading.description: Conduct a new tarot reading for a client using AI for interpretation.
reading.spreadDescription: The cards representing Past, Present, and Future.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are consulting, please wait...

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The AI could not provide an interpretation. Please try again.

yesNo.title: "Yes or No" Reading
yesNo.description: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, suitable for express services.
